title: unnatamAna
sahitya:
unnatamAna hEmavati Ongum arivu taruvAi


anupallavi

  sannata vAkkum sattiya vAzhvum calanamaTra manamum poliyum


caraNam    uNNa uDukka irukka nALum uzhaittup-pizhaikkum Ukkam uLLanbuDanE 
veLLam pOlE ulagukk-udavum Akkam kaNNan buddhan Esu kristu gAndhi 
appar pOlE karuNai pongik-kavitai pOlak-kiraNam vIsum kIrtiyuDanE
